Yoga and Meditation: Practicing yoga and meditation can help maintain flexibility, strength, and balance. It can also reduce stress and anxiety.
Out: Hiking, running, and cycling are great ways to stay active and fit. They can be done in and don't require any equipment.
Dancing: Dancing is a fun and way to stay active and fit. It can improve cardiovascular health, balance, and coordination.
Swimming: Swimming is a low-impact exercise that can help improve cardiovascular health, strength, and flexibility. It can be done in a pool or even in a river.
Resistance Training: Resistance training can help build strength and muscle mass. It can be done with bodyweight exercises, resistance bands, or even household objects like chairs or books.
